website_summaries.verdict: A basic, large set with acceptable quality and a value price. The best choice if you're watching your budget.
pros: Features 25 tools of all sizes in standard and metric
a wrench for almost every need
cons: Generally durable, though the finish lacks the quality of costlier sets, and the tools feel less sturdy

customer_reviews.title: it was the last bolt I needed out - so the vehicle will be disabled until I get a better quality wrench
customer_reviews.text: These are ok for the price probably, but I only really bought it for one size, and it dented in and became unusable on the first try while attempting to loosen an engine mount bracket that my socket couldn't get to, it was the last bolt I needed out - so the vehicle will be disabled until I get a better quality wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Delivered Apr 7, 2016 - Apr 12, 2016

customer_reviews.title: bad stuff
customer_reviews.text: pure garbage. the 7/16 boxed end is so far out of speck it doesn't grasp the nut. really poor quality. the wrench roll will last you about two weeks (maybe) then start falling apart. Oh and on the metric side I got two 10 mm wrenches instead of one 10 and one 11 mm.
customer_reviews.author: boomer

customer_reviews.title: OK for spares, not for a gift or every day use.
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to discover, but if you look on the box you can find the "Made in India" mark by the barcode. Pro: lots of wrenches for cheap. Fine for throwing in the truck in case of emergency. Con: pretty poor appearance. Rough edges, size and other markings inconsistent, storage bag has an unpleasant smell. As emergency spares they are OK, but you wouldn't want to use them every day or give them as a present.
customer_reviews.author: Tod B. Bookless

customer_reviews.title: 3rd year going strong
customer_reviews.text: Im working on my 3rd year with these. I do have other sets of name brand wrenches stacked neatly in their cases but these are great for the price and convenience. I've got the whole roll up on my peg board in my garage ready to go and easy to get to when needed. I've used them on my vehicles, lawn equipment, and everything else that has nuts and bolts. I haven't had any issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: Erniesouth77

customer_reviews.title: Weak and bends.... soft material and not durable
customer_reviews.text: I needed a set and thought I'd spend less... no... used the 9mm specifically and it bent and now is definitely not 9mm.. still cant get the bolt off. I drove to Home Depot just to buy a husky 9mm and that had no problem, didn't bend and finally got a bolt out. Be warned if using it for hard and tightened bolts as the wrenches appear to be really soft material compared to the forged ones like Husky. Otherwise it is good for general use and non-professional kit.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Fung

customer_reviews.title: Great wrench set
customer_reviews.text: These wrenches are a great set for the price you pay. I got these for myself at work, I don't do life threating mechanic or machine work. I just needed something that if I lost or grew feet it wouldn't hurt my bank. :-) I have used then a fews time at work already and feel they will take care of the need that I have for wrenches at work, toilets seat tighten, chainlink frence tighten, work on the curtains, tighten the cable wire, and what ever else that comes my way.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools for their price
customer_reviews.text: They look great and I like the pouch they came in. I know it may not last forever and may stretch and not look as good but for the budget price as they are placed at it's perfect for someone like me who works on their car from time to time but dont use the tools every day. They seem quality enough for me. Its great to hang up on a pegboard in the pouch that's what i bought this one for
customer_reviews.author: Jacob P.

customer_reviews.title: Storage Case Is Worthless
customer_reviews.text: The storage roll is super crappy. It arrived with most of the wrenches falling out. See pic. The wrenches see to be of decent weight but I have not used them yet. To replace the roll with a decent one is another $15 which would partly justify the cost of some of the more expensive sets. There is really no point in sending it back, you will just get the same in return. So, you either like the cost for the wrenches alone or you send it back and pay more. In the end, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle0802

customer_reviews.title: not expensive, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: apron is a little shallow for many of the larger wrenches.. but, you're not buying an apron. ?! right? You're buying an inexpensive set of wrenches. Wrenches haven't bent. Haven't put too much stress on them tho (yet), team isn't entirely inexperienced with such tools. -Eject Velocity- Shipping came quick from what i remember.
customer_reviews.author: EJECT VELOCITY

customer_reviews.title: Great set of wrenches
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for almost 10 years, great set of wrenches did plenty of auto repairs successfully without name brand tool truck price tags. Literally did thousands of dollars of auto repairs with this set of wrenches. If you break a wrench you were probably using the wrong tool to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I seem to have several sets of wrenches kicking around but can never seem to find the one I need. This set was purchased just for that reason. This is the sacred set that is safely locked in a separate tool chest with other tools of its kind. They are wrenches so I'm not sure that "Fantastic" was the right description but they do what they are supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Schwing

customer_reviews.title: they are not as perfect in their form and polish as the more expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: These wrenches do the job, they are not as perfect in their form and polish as the more expensive ones. I have cranked pretty hard with a couple of them without issue (even using a pipe on the end to get extra leverage). For the price, I would recommend them. I gave them a 4 out of 5 just because of the imprecise edges (minor imperfections).
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for 22$ bucks. But..........
customer_reviews.text: They're a little rough, but hey, its a tool. 5 star rating for the price. the numbering on these are kinda small. so if you're an Old Timer reading glasses are a MUST, if you choose to keep them loose around in the Job Box. used them today on my truck to do an oil change & front brakes and alternator job. again 22 dollars for 32 is hard to pass up. even IF you're more on the Craftsman, Matco, Snap On, Blue Point, Gearwrench, Husky, Stanley, Dewalt, SK, Williams, Proto, Armstrong..etc type of guy.
customer_reviews.author: Delta Divinity

customer_reviews.title: Good set of tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of tools. Have not used each one in the set but the ones I have used are good. They look strong and feel good in the hand. Had a problem with the original shipment and the seller fixed it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dx 101

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a good value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Good value for the money. You usually don't see problems for a year or two anyway, and all of them seem to be made from the same metals, etc. today. Gone are the days of "lifetime guaranteed" Craftsman tools unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price...not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Got these to install shocks & stabilizer on 2012 Jeep JK 4-Door, Item came on time and as advertised. No issues with weakness to metal used. Managed to work hard water bolts from under Jeep with not issues. I’d buy them again as a gift or just to have and secondary option for in Jeep tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Louis A. Cintron Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff...
customer_reviews.text: Great set of wrenches! I bought them because they were the most complete set of wrenches that I could find in this price range. I also like the carrying bag instead of the plastic holders that are so common now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lietz

customer_reviews.title: okay for spares and light use, not great for heavy users
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. Would've liked to have seen a 1 1/16 inch wrench with the set--had to buy it separately. I see they've removed the big "India" from the product image--don't be fooled, this isn't Colorado machining.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set to have in my truck. Are they the greatest thing since Craftsman? No, but do they save your bacon when you are in the middle of nowhere? Absolutely. for a non-mechanic like me, that uses tools every few months or less, these are ideal. I would defer to a true mechanic too determine if they are professional grade
customer_reviews.author: Loud Mic “Mike”

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for my road call box. I don't know how it would hold up if I had to use it every day. They kind of flex on really tight bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: First use, I broke the 11/16ths, not really trying very hard either. No other issues after that, with a LOT of use. Though that one did break, the very first time I used any of these wrnches So even though the rest have served Me quite well, minus 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Andor

customer_reviews.title: Great wrenches
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set well over a year. The wrenches are still in great condition. The case is starting to come apart though. This is after being brought back and forth in a tool bag to a boat constantly and used on cars many times. I'm happy with the product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Calex

customer_reviews.title: Bought them as a back up set of hand tools ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a back up set of hand tools for the ranch truck where hand tools get lost or removed frequently, so they are exactly what I needed. Fit and finish is acceptable and much less expensive than Craftsman or other brand names. If I need to get replacement hand tools again, will go here first. They don't get daily use but when used but function is completely satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Useless...
customer_reviews.text: Money lost. Should have checked origin. Made in India. That should have been enough. Broke on the first obstinate nut.
customer_reviews.author: DiscerningObserver

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great set and so organized. I always keep in the back of my car. Stronger than I expected and seem to hold up for jobs to come
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It's a wrench set
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, works great, fit seems right. I was able to take off my tranny and torque converter with them so I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for a great price
customer_reviews.text: These wrenches are great! They held up very well for the past year. Unfortunately I couldn't give it more than 4 stars because the case has begun to harden and crack on me. Nevertheless, the tools themselves work fantastically. they hare heavy and seem to be of high quality metal! ive put lots of stress on these wrenches without the slightest bend in the tool. This was a TERRIFIC buy!! just wish it had a better casing for the wrenches.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo guarisco

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. Bought a set to keep in my car for emergencies and for the price, you really can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Wrench set is fine but the storage wrap it comes in has started ...
customer_reviews.text: Wrench set is fine but the storage wrap it comes in has started to disintegrate. I do store it outside in my shed so the temp gets low but i can't even open the thing without them all falling out anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bress

customer_reviews.title: even when I'm wrenching hard on something there's no flaking like you get on the cheap tools
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these to work on my car and they are high-quality, even when I'm wrenching hard on something there's no flaking like you get on the cheap tools. Love the carrying case too, very convenient for toting around. I'd especially recommend these for someone looking for a travel set (like to races)
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more
customer_reviews.text: Could be better if I were to do it again I would spend a little more money and get a better set
customer_reviews.author: John Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but gets the job done always in need of an inexpensive wrench to cut on when the situation calls for it
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spare set
customer_reviews.text: Got these to put in my explorer.Nice to have a set just in case.Have a set in my truck,nice ones in the garage,of course when I die there will be tons of tools for somebody..:)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Worried? I was too.
customer_reviews.text: Okay. So I bought this set extremely worried I was getting something that just wouldn't do the task it was designed for. However... I am shocked and almost amazed these wrenches.... wrench. I know it sounds weird but a complete set for 25 bucks (what I paid) I just was worried. Yeah it's not super pretty or whatever blah blah. The point is... these wrenches are practical. They serve their purpose. They also are low cost. This is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Craigheadpro

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: They are are straight garbage I've already broken six out of the set anytime you exert any pressure they snap like toothpick
customer_reviews.author: BIGKev

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kit
customer_reviews.text: Solid set of wrenches for a good price. I haven't used heavily but, works great when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Muad'Dib

customer_reviews.title: Whole lot of bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: The numbers could be more readable on the wrenches, other the that these are solid quality and can take a lot of hammering (literally) Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I found cheaper ones elsewhere but I had already bought these. Are good though
customer_reviews.author: auyanetjl

customer_reviews.title: Nice full set of wrenches.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of wrenches, Easy to read the size of the wrench on the lettering on the wrench. The storage pouch is good also, the strings that secure it could have been slightly longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Spitzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice set wouldn't use them for professional use but for a hobbyist I think they'd be fine
customer_reviews.author: scott s.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality wrenches you could buy, not the lowest quality. I am just rating the wrenches because the holder is kind of irrelevant - if you do any construction projects involving any kind of moisture (especially plumbing) water will accumulate in the pockets and rust the wrenches.
customer_reviews.author: ibes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this style of wrench storage and wrench set. They have been beaten on already by farm hands.
customer_reviews.author: n/a

customer_reviews.title: Great budget wrenches
customer_reviews.text: They work great. Not the best quality but it is still good quality for the price. Minor cosmetic nicks but they work like any other wrench
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Works well from what I just used it for. Wrapping up is a bit awkward because you use a bow to essentially keep it closed. But hey it works.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Allas

customer_reviews.title: snapon will not like me saying this
customer_reviews.text: snapon will not like me saying this,,, but they are just as good as my snaps,,, and they are more inexpensive... that is why I do not have a complete set of snaps...
customer_reviews.author: del greening

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be decent for the money just a spare set for my pickup
customer_reviews.author: martin brady

customer_reviews.title: Good basic set but I wish it was more complete
customer_reviews.text: Good basic set but I wish it was more complete. It's missing vital sizes and I would gladly pay a little more for the few wrenches it's missing.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Corbett

customer_reviews.title: the wrenches are awesome but the roll up cloth is cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: the wrenches are awesome but the roll up cloth is cheap plastic, the tie that holds it together broke the first time I tied it. I thought it would have at least a ok holder but its worthless... But the wrenches (which is the actual product) are great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Great wrench set.
customer_reviews.text: Not the most beautiful wrench set I have ever owned, but the sizes work well and they were very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tony's

customer_reviews.title: Like these alot
customer_reviews.text: Like these alot. They are strong and work great. What else can be said. I like the soft case too.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: These wrenches are very durable. They are conveniently located in the roll up pouch that has the size on the pocket which helps get the wrench you need quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good wrenches with one mistake
customer_reviews.text: I don't have many issues with this item, except, I was given two 12mm wrenches when one of them was supposed to have been a 13mm
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: These spanner set is perfect it has smallest to larger spanner in it very ...
customer_reviews.text: These spanner set is perfect it has smallest to larger spanner in it very handy for all sorts of application. i.e for the car, in the house or workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Harsha Ramji

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are cheap wrenches that get the job done. I bought these for my husband for Valentines Day and for what he needs them for they are perfect. They are thinner than more expensive wrenches and according to him that makes it easier for him to get into tight places with them. So far he is happy and they have yet to break.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for having an extra set. Remember, you get what you pay for. -Kyle
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped in a single uses shipping envelope. When it arrived an end of a wrench was sticking out. Should have been in a box. Wrenches look good and I like everything in one pouch for carrying around. I would have preferred the pouch be made of canvas rather than plastic for durability. For the price it is a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: Decent wrench set
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad set for a backup. Decent quality. Great price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hallock

customer_reviews.title: 2nd set
customer_reviews.text: Got a second set as a gift for someone. Been using the first set a lot and no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wall

customer_reviews.title: Good set but missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: I really like the set, it has worked well for me so far, minus one thing... They sent me two 9mm wrenches and I'm missing the 8mm wrench. That is why they are getting the 1 star review. If I get an 8mm wrench I'll change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They appear to be quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Half are SAE and half are metric with standard sizes. They appear to be quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gegg

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality wrench set!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality wrench set! I love how they FOLD/ROLL up perfectly and can be tied together by the sewn on strap. Excellent design. Very easily and well-laid out.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dubya ;)

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: These are better than you can imagine there not a 100 set of wrenches but they work well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1st use the 18mm wrench broke. this was the first time any of them were used.
customer_reviews.text: soft cast metal useless. do not buy if they allow no stars they would be no stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Couldnuse 17mm
customer_reviews.text: Awsome wrenches. Needs 17mm not 18mm 17 is mich more.common.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and good length great roll up and carry case that comes with them
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: They good but a bit kinda cheap but they will work ...
customer_reviews.text: They good but a bit kinda cheap but they will work but just know when the time comes when they get strip well it just that time
customer_reviews.author: Moses MF

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid, im very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, but the plastic is cheap and it's cracking already. But it's a cheap product for the house.
customer_reviews.author: james ramey

customer_reviews.title: They work well, strong wrenches, and he uses ...
customer_reviews.text: They work well, strong wrenches, and he uses them all the time. The holder is quite handy for keeping them sorted.
customer_reviews.author: LisaJ

customer_reviews.title: Hell yeah
customer_reviews.text: Used once. bought to keep in a grapple skidder incase needed while in woods. Only used once so far. seems good though
customer_reviews.author: stephen n.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wrench set, even cheaper holder. Breaks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap wrench set, even cheaper holder. Breaks and falls apart quickly. Especially in the cold. Kinda expected with the price.
customer_reviews.author: John Ramos

customer_reviews.title: A wrenching good set
customer_reviews.text: A very good full set. Even though I only needed a few of the smaller pieces the investment was minor and I got more than I needed for the job at hand. Placed the little ones in my hobby box and the others in my work tool box/
customer_reviews.author: starrroad

customer_reviews.title: SEEMS TO BE A QUALITY TOOL
customer_reviews.text: SEEMS TO BE A QUALITY TOOL. HAVE SENT THEM TO THE PHILLIPPINES. WILL SEE HOW THEY HOLD UP. MORE TO COME.
customer_reviews.author: coffman580@msn.com

customer_reviews.title: Good for household and lite to medium mechanical work.
customer_reviews.text: Good for household and lite to medium mechanical work. I buy and use the best quality throw away tools to use when I don't need to use my good stuff. Also great as backup tools when you just need to hold a nut or bolt when using an air ratchet.
customer_reviews.author: Chief1472

customer_reviews.title: Great set of end wrenches
customer_reviews.text: Great set of end wrenches. The only problem I have with them is that the plastic on the "roll up mat" has broken and the wrenches can slide out. Mine stays rolled when not being used so this really isn't a problem. I haven't had any problems with the chrome finish. They stay in my tool box and bump against each other constantly without noticeable wear. I would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota D.

customer_reviews.title: Budget wrenches with decent value
customer_reviews.text: Decent wrenches for the money. I Already have two wrenches that seem to bent and chipped slightly at the lips of the open end after trying to remove a nut.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Neal

customer_reviews.title: Stubby's......
customer_reviews.text: Really should be considered stubby's.. other than that they are a wrench.. none have broke or disappointed me.. I use everday, i use them as a stubby set...
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is the wonderful product I buy it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Luis Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very handy wrench set that I bought for the sole ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy wrench set that I bought for the sole purpose of leaving in my vehicle in case I need a wrench and I'm not near my toolbox. These are cheap enough that I didn't mind buying just to leave in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R.

customer_reviews.title: This wrench set it nice. However the case they are stored in is ...
customer_reviews.text: This wrench set it nice. However the case they are stored in is complete junk. Chipped and broke in cold weather and the loop eyelets didn't take much abuse before pulling out. Nice wrenches, but terrible case.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: GRIP 89358 MM/SAE Combination Wrench Set
customer_reviews.text: GRIP 89358 MM/SAE Combination Wrench Set so far is working great I seen a few reviews of people complaining about the chrome finish peeling off so far it has not happened to me but I will update if it does.
customer_reviews.author: Ax3l Plays

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wrenches for all your home improvement needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to replace a shower head in my new apt, which I was able to do with ease thanks to this set. I was also able to fix the pipes to my kitchen and bathroom sinks!
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Salguero

customer_reviews.title: Like 1/2" bolts seeming to barely fit in the appropriate ...
customer_reviews.text: Feel solid for the price but they don't seem to fit as expected. Like 1/2" bolts seeming to barely fit in the appropriate wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Stickx911

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I needed for home projects. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joan McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: I have no complaints about this set so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a decent set of wrenches especially for the money.They seem to fit accurately and work as they are supposed to. I have no complaints about this set so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jake the snake

customer_reviews.title: had 2 of the big wrenches,  the same
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 of the big wrenches, the same ,insread of metric and standard. They discounted for me to buy the right replacement... maybe a better one; but, I don't remember where I put it! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of tools. Comes in heavy duty roll up bag. The tools are not well finished in some areas but for the money it's a serviceable set and I am happy to add this set to my tools without spending a bundle.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tenison

customer_reviews.title: Good assortment, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Okay wrenches, many sizes, but the edges are sharp and I get the feeling if I had to wail on one with a hammer one would snap in two.
customer_reviews.author: connor

customer_reviews.title: A useful collection
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of the various ratchet and other odd wrenches. They often won't fit in tight quarters. This set is simple and straightforward, and we all seem to need both metric and SAE sizes, so it's a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad set
customer_reviews.text: Was a very inexpensive set to keep on the quad. Little better quality than usual China stuff from the past.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good to have around, not to cheap, not the best, does what it needs to do. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Slick

customer_reviews.title: I wanted an extra set of wrenches with the large sizes to small in SAE and MM and these fit the bill in a nice hanging bag
customer_reviews.text: For the money they fit the bill. Don't expect craftsmanship. I wanted an extra set of wrenches with the large sizes to small in SAE and MM and these fit the bill in a nice hanging bag.
customer_reviews.author: Akita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the money. Couldn't be happier for something that stays in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Cale

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for selling Great tools at affordable prices
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for selling Great tools at affordable prices, i look forward on doing business with you in the future. Respectfully Denis
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Missing wrench.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. But was missing 1/2" wrench. Hope they will replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for on the road kit
customer_reviews.text: very good quality tools all popular sizes , Keep them in our travel trailer
customer_reviews.author: David A. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Perfected to Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Put to use several times, performance is excellent, would recommend to anyone asking.
customer_reviews.author: Yukoner

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of wrenches to wrench with.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough, these are wrenches, they put things on and off. Haven't broken any so I call that a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: v650

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Order was on time and packed well. Wrench came in a organizer for easy selection of the correct wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Miller

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Opted to return/refund item same day it arrived. Very poor quality control has been exercised. Half of the wrenches were missing from the tool roll.
customer_reviews.author: PistolPriest

product_meta.description: Grip combination wrench set combines both MM and SAE sizes for use while repairing objects around the home, garage, or workshop.
